LightningComponentBundle.description: Advanced lookup component for Salesforce Flows with support for single and multiple record selection, customizable display formats, and dynamic field configuration.

propertyType.name: T
propertyType.label: Record Type
propertyType.description: Generic sObject data type used for record properties

property.name: objectApiName
property.label: Object API Name
property.description: The API name of the Salesforce object to search (e.g., Account, Contact)

property.name: primaryField
property.label: Primary Field
property.description: The main field to display and search (e.g., Name)

property.name: secondaryFields
property.label: Secondary Fields
property.description: Additional field to display in search results

property.name: tertiaryFields
property.label: Tertiary Fields
property.description: Third field to display in search results

property.name: displayFormat
property.label: Display Format
property.description: How to display selected records: pills or datatable

property.name: tableFields
property.label: Table Fields
property.description: Comma-separated list of fields to show in datatable format

property.name: placeholder
property.label: Placeholder Text
property.description: Text to display in empty search input

property.name: recordId
property.label: Selected Record ID
property.description: ID of the selected record (single selection only)

property.name: primaryFieldValue
property.label: Primary Field Value
property.description: Value of the primary field for selected record

property.name: secondaryFieldValue
property.label: Secondary Field Value
property.description: Value of the secondary field for selected record

property.name: tertiaryFieldValue
property.label: Tertiary Field Value
property.description: Value of the tertiary field for selected record

property.name: selectedRecordIds
property.label: Selected Record IDs
property.description: Array of IDs for selected records (multiple selection only)

property.name: selectedRecords
property.label: Selected Records
property.description: Array of selected record objects (multiple selection only)
